articles.title: Neuer Trend beim Böllern: Das stille Feuerwerk
articles.image_title: 15.12.2022, Bremen, Bremerhaven: Das Feuerwerksunternehmen Comet stellt seine neuesten Produkte für das Silvesterfeuerwerk bei einem Musterschießen vor. Comet setzt künftig auf Pyrotechnik mit weniger Plastikanteil. Ziel sei es, Kunststoffe bei Feuerwerkskörpern und Verpackungen vollständig zu vermeiden. Foto: Lars Klemmer/dpa +++ dpa-Bildfunk +++

articles.author: 1 Min

articles.title: Extreme Kälte in den USA – Menschen erfrieren in ihren Autos
articles.image_title: December 23, 2022, McLean County, Illinois, USA: Pedestrians struggle to walk against the wind to cross the street in Downtown Bloomington. Winter storm Elliott blew through McLean County Illinois on December 22nd dropping little snow but bringing extreme cold and strong winds causing near white out conditions in some places. The timing was less than desirable for residents who were looking for a white Christmas but not the hardships the cold and wind bring. (Credit Image: © Alan Look/ZUMA Press Wire
articles.author: 1 Min

articles.title: Dutzende Tote durch extreme Kältewelle in den USA
articles.image_title: December 22, 2022, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA: A pedestrian walks down Nicollet Mall while high winds kick up snow in downtown Minneapolis. The Twin Cities saw 8 inches of snow Wednesday followed by wind gusts up to 50mph and windchills reaching -35 degrees F on Thursday and Friday. A powerful Arctic winter storm is making its way through the US and parts of Canada, bringing with it frigid temperatures and flight delays ahead of the busiest travel days of the year. (Credit Image: © Alex Kormann/Minneapolis Star Tribune via ZUMA Press Wire
